mapper.update: update notice set noticeTitle = #{noticeTitle}, noticeContent = #{noticeContent}, noticeType = #{noticeType}, noticePinned = #{noticePinned}, noticeActive = #{noticeActive} where noticeNum = #{noticeNum}
mapper.select: select * from notice where noticeActive = 1 order by noticePinned DESC, noticeDate DESC limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
select noticeNum, noticeTitle, noticeDate from notice where noticeActive = 1 order by noticePinned desc, noticeDate desc limit 3
select count(*) from notice where noticeActive = 1
